===== Built using DXCore 12.1 =====
=== Introduction ===
A simple plugin which allows one to reverse the ALL CAPS nature of VS2012 RC's main menus.

This allows you to change the VS2012 RC Menus from...

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_UpperCaseMenuControl/Screenshots/UPPERCASE.png

...To...

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_UpperCaseMenuControl/Screenshots/MixedCase.png


=== Usage ===
  * Visit *DevExpress\Options* ... 
  * Locate *IDE\UPPER CASE MENUS*
  * Choose either '*ALL CAPS*' or '*Title Case*'
  * Click OK.
  * Note: You will need to restart Visual Studio for this setting to take effect.

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_UpperCaseMenuControl/Screenshots/CR_UpperCaseMenuControl.png
